name: Shelley Duvall's It's a Bird's Life
description: Written and narrated by Shelley Duvall, It's a Bird's Life follows a group of lively parrots on a round-trip journey from Los Angeles to the Amazon Rainforest after their home in L.A. burns down. It is a 60-page interactive storybook along with 11 original sing-along songs and 26 games, puzzles, and activities. Befriend Humpty, Mowgli, Pearlie, and others as you together experience the world along the way. It includes mini-games, puzzles, and many other interactive and multimedia activities. It is designed for kids ages 3-6.
